translations: v．行骗，诈骗：通过欺诈手段从他人处获取钱财或物品。
· He was caught grifting tourists in the city center.
他在市中心行骗游客被抓了。

sentences.sentence: His hopes for serving in uniform dashed, Dannl realized that there was profit and excitement to be had in the art of confidence and grifting.
sentences.translation: 穿制服服役的希望落空了，但丹恩尔发现，通过信心和欺骗能发财和寻求刺激。
